website_summaries.verdict: A quality bikini with removable straps at a value price point.
pros: Removable straps are easy to secure
High waist, high cut bottoms elongate your legs
cons: Top runs quite large compared to bottoms

customer_reviews.title: I feel comfortable and confident in all the best ways
customer_reviews.text: yooooooo This is the first ever two piece I have bought and owned since I was maybe 3 years old. I finally said "f it" and went for it after struggling with my body image. (to paint a picture I'm 5'5" and about 220lbs) I put this suit on and looked in the mirror and saw a fierce piece of ass. I feel comfortable and confident in all the best ways. It makes my waist look smaller and my butt look bigger. I'm really living my best life in this suit. I don't think I have ever written an amazon review but I couldn't not with this. I totally recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not super thick but enough to cover, a little cheeky on the butt but overall looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waist 34" 200lbs XL
customer_reviews.text: My waist is 34" and I'm 200 lbs and this fits great I got the xl and while I was nervous because some people do not receive the right swimsuit, I took a chance and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel W.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Ordered up one size (pretty typical with Asian sizing for me, I’m usually a L so a got an XL). I love this suit! The bottoms are so cute and comfy. Top is not bad but it’s a little wide for me, I’m a 34/36 DDD, 5’4”, and typically a size 12-but I also have a short torso.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bikini!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I received sooo many compliments and when I posted pictures of myself wearing it on social media many girls reached out to see where they could buy it because it looked cute on me! My favorite bikini ever! Will be purchasing more colors. As for sizing, I am 5'5, 130 lbs and a small was the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Grevenow

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy pink!
customer_reviews.text: I got the pink version and it’s not even pink it’s nude! It also looks like different material than some of the reviews I’ve seen. So disappointed. The back of the top is weirdly thicker than the front, the bottoms are okay but they make it look kind of seemless on the picture and it ended up accentuating my love handles. I’m 130lbs and I got a medium. The fit is okay, I think it’s more just a weird bathing suit. It arrived on time but gosh it definitely was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love love the color and fit. FYI the bottoms almost fit like a thong and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyreese Fields

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent with sending the right product
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in two differently styles for some colors. I got the royal blue product and it came as the one pictured. Bottoms fit amazing, but top was WAY to big. I'm 5'1 and 110 lbs and bought a size small. For the light pink one I order the top was the same as pictured, but the bottoms were not. For that style the top fit amazing, but the bottoms hugged my love handles a little too tight. Get it together with sending the correct product or establish the two different styles in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is so flattering and fits so well. Arrived with removable and adjustable straps and pads in the top—are also removable. Super comfy, definitely cheeky, and the perfect fit all around. I ordered a medium, I’m a 32DDD, and I wear size 26 pants for reference.
customer_reviews.author: suchadahl

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it the top is big. I ordered a size medium i folded down the top and bottom of the bathing suit top to make it smaller. Removed the straps and wrapped it around my waist. I also tried tying the straps down the middle of the bathing suit top. That was really cute too. Would definitely buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DIONNA

customer_reviews.title: Plus size body type? Yes queen buy it
customer_reviews.text: Size: xl - 5’1 - 12/14 in jeans - large/xl in tops - 178lbs Pros: The suit will hide anything you don’t wanna show. Smooths out love handles and belly pouch Cons: the straps were broken and wouldn’t attach The material is super stretchy and doesn’t cut off the skin. Smelled fine. Delivered in 1 day (3.99) extra cost but worth it for the holiday July 4th
customer_reviews.author: Halinicole

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these beauties! Was unsure with the reviews on what size to get. I am almost 5 months postpartum with my second baby, and I’m 133lbs, 5ft 4in tall. I have a smaller chest but a somewhat wider back. Usually a 36 b about. I ordered a medium And I love the fit! I don’t like too tight of a suit, so this works out perfectly. Love the color gray and second bathing royal blue ! Wanting another in black 🥰 Must buy! Don’t second guess it, it is SO comfy and fits all body types !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Girls with thick hips or hip dips beware
customer_reviews.text: First off this bathing suit is ADORABLE! Like so super cute I almost wanted to keep it; BUT, it really did not flatter my body shape. I am a G cup. 5 ft. 7in. long torso and legs 180lbs. I have thick hips and hip dips (please google so you understand). The top fit like a glove. The bottoms... well the high waist part was not so high on my tummy and my hip dips were not flattering with the cut of the bikini. HOWEVER, the product quality was really nice. In my situation even ordering a size up would make the bottoms too big :(
customer_reviews.author: Sonja & Rob

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bikini! I am very self conscious of my lower stomach, so the high waist is perfect for me. I used the other reviews to determine the size i ordered (medium) which fits right. I’m 5’2 and about 137 lbs. The grey color is beautiful and unique. I actually feel confident in a bathing suit for the first time ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: YALLLLLLLLL!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’11 212lbs, size 12 in jeans, 14/16 in dresses, 36DD bra. It is soooo difficult to find swim suits that fit my boob and ass without looking like a grandma on the beach. This swim suit is amazing. The girls are sitting pretty without the straps and it covers just enough tummy without digging into your sides and making it look like you have jelly rolls. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: shantol

customer_reviews.title: SUMMER, HERE I COME!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bathing suit. Color is vibrant. It's a real high waist bottom, covers my belly button without stretching it too much. The back is some kind of V shape. Usually wear size 10 in jeans because of my big thighs, and medium top (bra size 36B). Bought size L, somewhat big around the waist and top too big. But nothing I cannot fix with a little alteration and I'll be ready for summer. Looking to buy another color. You got a really happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy Girl

customer_reviews.title: XL - I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1", 180lbs, 38DD, size 14 in pants and ordered an XL..this was a perfect fit. Great coverage for my stomach. The right amount of cheeky. It came with adjustable straps and I'm glad it did. Although I didn't plan on wearing the straps, because I wanted the tube top look, I had to wear the straps to secure my girls. I'll probably order another in a diff color.
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Three stars
customer_reviews.text: The bikini is good quality but I don't really like it. I purchased a Medium, I'm 168 lbs and 5'5.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bathing suit for someone trying to cover up some ...
customer_reviews.text: So let me start off by saying, its worth the price. My measurements are about 40-31-42. 5'6-5'7 and about 160 lbs. This is a great bathing suit for someone trying to cover up some tummy. The bottoms fit me perfectly, however the top is a little tinyyyyy bit loose for my liking but i think if i went down a size it would be too tight. Only thing I'm worried about is going in the water and it getting loose. Otherwise, i can't wait to wear this in mexico. Ill probably order the pink and black as well, if everything turns out great on my vacation :)
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: WORTH THE PRICE AND ITS VERY FLATTERING!!! Super cute and I feel comfortable when swimming or lounging. This is a perfect fit for most if not all body types. I have worn this medium size from when I was a size 10 to now at a 4/6. It just clings on to you perfectly without creating rolls. The top piece in pink was a tiny bit see through (when wet) if anyone is concerned, this can be fixed with inserting the provided padding. I really wish the shipping had gotten here faster because I would order more before the summer is over.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Little big but love it
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this suit and thought it was true to the picture (I got the green color). It fit a little big, especially the top. I’m a 36D and usually a medium panty. 5’6 and 135 pounds and the small fit well. The medium bottoms fit well but the top was too large in the underbust. The small bottom fit a little tighter but still wearable, and the top fit soooo much better and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Height: 5’6 Weight:180 Bra:36C
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the black bathing suit in a Large because of reviews and size chart and it had an ok fit. I decided to get another one for an event and got the blue color and got it in a medium and it fit amazingly! I personally don’t like straps and the pads so I just took them off. (PS I weigh more than I look)
customer_reviews.author: LeLe Collis

customer_reviews.title: Will look great on a curvy woman
customer_reviews.text: Not as flattering as I expected on my body type but it’s a great suit! Will look amazing on someone more curvy or hourglass figure.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Armentrout

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected after reading the reviews, the top is a little too big for my liking, but it fit nonetheless. The bottoms are just right. It’s cheeky, but not TOO exposed. I ordered a medium - I’m 5’5 140 lbs, I have a 30” waist, 40” hips and wear a 34C in bras. Hope this helps :)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: GLOW UP
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove this 2-piece!!! The color is BOMB and really stands out. Both the bottoms and top feel secure so you can do what you want without worrying about a wardrobe malfunction. I’m pretty curvy and slim in the waist. I wear a size 12 in bottoms (thighs and booty), 10 in dresses, and am a 36 DD and bought a size L (top/bottom). The bottoms are VERY cheeky though, so if you like more coverage, these probably aren’t the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbi

customer_reviews.title: High waist and cheeky
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2 113lbs and got size small. I'm 34A cup and top is kinda big but not in a bad way, still looks fine. Back of bottoms is slightly see through and I bet when wet your crack will kinda show but I'm not wearing at a crowded family pool but on a tropical beach vacation. Although I'm petite, I have a mom pooch and this hides it completely! If you want a side roll covered, just lift the band a little higher (as I did in photo) I'm really picky about covering what I see as flaws when wearing swimwear and this does a pretty good job! My husband even said it looked good!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: The Bottoms Are Cut Weird
customer_reviews.text: The top is too loose and has no support if you wear it with/without the straps. The bottoms go past your belly button which is great but the cut exposes your crotch by a LOT. I was planning on wearing this to the beach in Maui with my family but this would be way too inappropriate​.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: The BEST High Waist Swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is SO flattering! Pros: The cut of the bottoms - holy hell. Just perfect. The stitching isn't too tight anywhere, so no squished in feeling. The colors! Ended up ordering two more colors (green and red) for friends. All of the colors were stunningly beautiful. Removable strap on the top. Perfect for when you want to have a swimsuit with more support. Cons: Part of the lining on each of the pieces is white. Not a fan, but it's easy to overlook with all of the other great things this swimsuit has to offer. Follow us on Insta at @TastebudTravel_ to see all of the great products we travel with!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff & Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high waisted bikini!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for the perfect high waisted bikini for my trip to Hawaii and this was a winner! I had many failed attempts with bikinis before finding this one, but the fit, quality and price was spot on. The bottoms are a little cheeky, but suck you in really nicely. I purchased an XL (normally a 12/14) and it fit perfectly. I have a small chest and it still worked fine for me. Its very stretchy, so it should work for women with larger chests as well. Definitely recommend this one! You can see more style inspo on my Instagram @roseandchambray or on my Amazon page!
customer_reviews.author: Aryanna Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Cute but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Cute style but unwearable in public. I order the white, size large. I typically wear a medium, A cup. Fits but definitely on the small side. No padding, no straps and completely see through.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: 34DDD, 130lbs, size medium
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this suit. The straps are kind of odd, but I don’t intend to use them ever anyway, and i removed the padding from the top too. I always have a hard time finding swimsuits that fit properly, as my chest is quite large, and bottom quite small, but this fits GREAT! I love it so much, I ordered another one too.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The top is a little bit big but I'm smaller on the top and would usually order a small but needed a medium for the bottom. I'm 5'2" and usually wear medium bottoms and small tops.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Blood
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a zero star I would...I recieved the bathing suit bottoms used with blood on them....nasty ass people!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Suit for Big Hips
customer_reviews.text: ATTENTION GIRLS WITH HIPS: This is the two piece for you!! Im so in love with this swimsuit. Ive been trying for ages to find a two piece that conceals my big hips without making me feel like im 40 years old and this suit fits amazing. A tad cheeky in the behind but not bad at all. I highly recommend and will probably buy another in a different color. Do yourself a favor and buy this! Im 5’5 and 135 and I got the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylamb

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Color red is great. Bottom is perfect, top is a little big, I'm small on top but a small usually fits. Good quality for the price, particularly the bottom. Typical cheapy removable straps but not horrendous. Really like this suit, the bottom makes the piece, cheeky with sexy (not granny) high waist. Wish I could grow an inch of boobs but that ain't happening so maybe I'll figure how to properly take in the top. As it fits now good for lounging, not activity if the straps are not attached. I'm 140 athletic 5'7 34, 29, 39.
customer_reviews.author: MelRay

customer_reviews.title: Size up and you will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size Large and needed a size XL is this because the top was too tight around my chest. This is really cute, great color, the cut of the bottom is so attractive. I wish more bottoms where made like this. I'm 5'6', 36B/C bra and wear size 10/12 jeans from Express to give you an idea on measurements. This suit is totally worth the price even if you just like the top or the bottom, you can mix with other suits you have.
customer_reviews.author: Wake forest, NC

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but slightly small
customer_reviews.text: Cute. I feel like it is sized for juniors because it was a little tight, but I will still wear as it covers enough 'bulge'. The straps on the top seem to be oddly placed though, more mid-boob versus off to the sides where normal spaghetti straps would be placed. The material is not lined in the back of the suit so beware of your crack possibly showing through when getting wet. I'm wearing out of the country with all female adults, so I could care less about it being see-through. I am 5'7, size 14-16 and ordered an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Curvy athletic mom bod approved
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gorgeous color and will look great when I’m tan. The bottoms are the type of fit I like, but they do cut in a little bit on my hips (not the fault of the suit, thanks childbirth). I’m pleasantly surprised as to how well the top fits. I’m a 36DDD and it covers them. Not super supportive without the straps, but I didn’t expect it to be. It covers the mom pooch, but a darker color would hide it even better if that’s something you’re concerned about. I ordered an XL and I’m between 180-185 lbs, approximate measurements: bust is 44”, waist is 34”, and hips are 45”
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit ! It’s a good quality and it’s Comfy. I’m 5’7 170lbs and got a large. It’s not a thong but it still shows enough booty
customer_reviews.author: Madeline A.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was so surprised by how well it fit. The bottoms fit so comfortable, I have a tummy. I'm a mommy I've had 3 cesareans. Bathing suits I struggle with. But these bottoms fit amazing & the top too! I bought a XL I usually have issues in the breast area with swimsuits. The top held WELL without the straps, but I'm glad there is straps as a option too. I could probably a large in the top, but I'm extremely happy with the fit overall. So cute, so comfy, stretchy & soft. I will be ordering others.
customer_reviews.author: Cherity Petty

customer_reviews.title: Curvy girl approved,  great camouflage!
customer_reviews.text: I am a curvy thick woman, height 5'7", size 14 jeans, large rump, smallish waist but still have a pooch, 38E bust. I bought this swimsuit to go under a very pretty cover also bought from Amazon. I love it, I bought the blue one too, but the leopard fits way better! It snatches in the pooch area a little more then the blue suit and also offers way more camouflage giving the illusion of a much smaller waist than I actually have.
customer_reviews.author: izzesparks

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for the bottoms
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated, the top runs large, but the bottoms are true to size and very flattering(cheeks are visible though)! I will be using my bottoms to mix and match with other tops I already own. The color (neon green) is not neon like a highlighter, it's more of a bleached neon or neon pastel and it's way prettier than a regular neon. I will definitely be buying other colors, just for the bottoms! I literally never take bikini pics, so the fact that I feel good enough to even post a pic says how nice this suit made me feel. Taking a star off because the top is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hint of cheeky
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on the suit is soft and comfortable for swim wear. The sizing is a bit off and wish it could be a mix & match. L bottoms fits like a M. The L top fits like a L with a little room. The removable strap is positioned more in the middle instead of closer to your armpit so it’s a bit awkward. The top length is longer than expected. It sits more on the mid section than just under the bust. If you have a short torso like me, it fits like a tube top. Overall- great fabric and print, love the bottom it has a perfect hint of cheeky.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Great color but thin fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning it. I got the bright green and the fabric in the bottoms is very thin. Like see through thin, especially in the back. Also, because my wast is not significantly smaller than my hips, I don’t like the way it looks. If you’re blessed with a waste that is 10” smaller than your hips, or if you just don’t have body fat, this swimsuit would be really really cute. I like the retro high hip cut on the bottoms. And, the bright green is really bright green. I loved the color. I just wish the bottoms were a little thicker material and I wish it had some tummy control.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy E.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size small AND not the best option if you're top or bottom heavy as one piece will be too big
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, i decided to buy a size bigger than i normally wear. I normally wear a large so i got XL. The top is bigger than the bottom so it's not convenient for ladies who are bigger on the bottom half of their body than the top. It looked cute with or without the straps but i wore without due to wanting a strapless tan line. The top kept falling down constantly and riding up/ folding under from the bottom seam of the top. I liked the bottom just fine. They should make it where you can select size for top and bottom individually. I was 5'5 and 165lbs at the time i wore this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit. The bright orange is AMAZING! The straps are adjustable and can be removed from the front and back. Took Photos to show different ways to wear. The bottoms are a little less coverage than I was expecting but it doesn’t really bother me, just something to note. Fabric is nice and the quality seems good. There is light padding in the top and slots to remove. Really good price for the suit! For reference, I am 5’4”, 135lbs, 34DD
customer_reviews.author: agalanto

customer_reviews.title: 5’3”, 32DDD, 130lbs, medium
customer_reviews.text: 5’3”, 32DDD, 130lbs, size Medium This is a great product for the money but I really wanted the straps but they attach at a really weird point (too close together in the front and you can see the hooks). The top fits well and the bottoms fit nicely but are definitely cheekie so be prepared for that but this is overall great! Might look into the other style that was more like a bralette though with the wide straps on it already like a sports bra.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This suit is super flattering. The high cut and thick waist band ...
customer_reviews.text: This suit is super flattering. The high cut and thick waist band is super concealing. I am 5'4" and around 160ish lbs with a smaller top and a thicker bottom half and this swimsuit fit me perfectly. The top could be a bit smaller, but the bottoms fit really really well. I usually wear a medium or large bottoms, and size 8-10, and after reading reviews I decided to go with the large. The color is a bit more neon than I expected, but still will look really good with a tan. If you're usually in between sizes like I am, I would say go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: This would be an awesome bathing suit if it were constructed better. it's seems like there are two panels sewn together so each side of this slippery material moves independent of each other, creating the folds and overlap in the garment you see in other people's pictures. The foam breast pads worked fine in the two suits I ordered - I didn't feel the need to remove them. The bottom section gives a decent fit but the top can be iffy as it varies depending on chest size - bigger chest gives better fit. I personally wouldn't be seen in public wearing this because it looks unfinished and cheap..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes your figure look great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bikini! It fits really nice and is a really good material. It doesn’t squeeze me in my stomach which is really nice with a high waisted like this. It really makes your figure look nice. The only thing is that the top is a little loose fitting. I’m 5’1”, around 120lbs, I have 34dd, and I normally wear around a size 4 in pants and I ordered a medium and it fits very well! Overall it was a really good bathing suit for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase more
customer_reviews.text: Love this bathing suit. The thickness and color are great. Perfect fit on the bottom but the top is a touch awkward fitting could be a bit more supportive. I think the top needs larger pads or to fit a little tighter. I’m 5’5 and about 150, I ordered a medium. However it’s a minor detail, not stopping me from loving it, the suit feels great on. I have ordered from this company before and in general the swimwear is really good quality. It’s comfy and quick delivery! I’ll order again.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent..
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give it 5 stars, but while I was on vacation, it was brought to my attention that the bottoms became slightly see-through when wet (I had work it in salt water 3 or 4 times at that point, not sure if that makes a difference). I'll still wear it though - I love how high the waist comes up and that the top is convertible (I left the straps off and the top stayed up just fine) 42DDD-35-51. Will probably buy more colors for next vacation
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Great suit to hide my mom tummy wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this based off the reviews. I am 5.3 and a half and I currently weigh 150 I have an hour glass athletic shape very tiny waist thick hips no boobs lol anyways I wanted it to cover my wrinkly mom tummy and it does unfortunately I ordered a large the top is a little too big so I'll have to wear the straps and the bottom is too big I should have gotten a medium it's definitely true to size. Will order the right size.
customer_reviews.author: MotoFem

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and sits at a great spot on the tummy ...
customer_reviews.text: This bikini fits true to size. I’m 5’2 and 137 (5 months post partum) I ordered a size medium. Pros: very comfortable and sits at a great spot on the tummy area without being tight. Also a great cut in the booty area! Cons: I think it sits a bit high in the back because I’m pretty short but it doesn’t exactly bother me. Also, I have thick thighs so it’s a bit tight in the leg holes but not too bad. Just beware if you’re even shorter than me!! All in all I think it’s amazing for $22 and it’s a great high waisted bikini without being overly high waisted or too much material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for DD’s
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed and very cheap material. I’m 5’7 175lbs and have a DD chest. I ordered a large and the whole thing was terrible. The top fit my chest as far as coverage went but there is NO support even with the straps attached. The hooks for the straps were so flimsy it was an accident waiting to happen. The bottoms were very thin, the waist fit just fine but there was some weird gaping happen on the cheeks. I returned this swim suite and received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said this wasn't bathing suit material, was wrong. Great swimsuit in general. I loved the bottoms! They weren't thongs but were perfect coverage for my booty. Kinda cheeky. The top was not as big as I'd expected. Many comments said that it was a little baggy in the chest...maybe this is made for bigger chested women...idk...I could've had more to cover my 36DD's with. I thought it looked nice without cleavage showing, however, once pulled above the cleavage, then it all spills out the bottom.. Overall, it works for me. I don't liked tan lines on my chest, so, the bandeau top is great. Might order another color. 225lbs. Size 14 pants 5'7
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it, feel good, maybe you’ll feel like Beyoncé too.
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with feeling good with a swim suit since I am a curvy woman. But man oh man this suit makes me feel like I am Beyoncé. It fits perfectly and hugs what I need it to do. I am 140 pounds and got a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Squared

customer_reviews.title: *sigh*
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this suit so so much but the sizing is so weird. I ordered it so that the bottoms would fit (I am usually a medium-large on bottom and small-medium top) but the top was literally unwearable because it was soooooo big. The material was a little thin so I wouldn't get it in a bright color. I wish suits came where you could mix sizes otherwise I would have made it work, but the top literally would not stay up and going a size down in the bottoms would have caused other problems.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Little too big but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 130lbs 34DD. I ordered a medium and The bottoms were a little bit longer than expected and came to above my naval. Still super cute!! But I’ll save the bottoms for night time or cloudy days. And with the top, I wore it to the pool and the beach, didn’t have any trouble with it falling down. Although it was more loose than I prefer so I’m debating getting a small.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: New favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite bathing suit! Super flattering! Don't buy if you're too shy to have your booty out though lol I'm probably going to buy a few colors of these cause the price is great too. I'm 5'6 135lbs 32ddd and i got a medium, it fits perfectly but I had to take the padding out of the top
customer_reviews.author: auuu

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: So this summer I wanted a 2 piece but I use to be really insecure about my body, and I debated on not ordering this one a ton of times but I am so HAPPY I did! The bottoms are great, they feel great and give me just the boost of confidence i was looking for they aren’t that cheeky unless you bend over lol! The top could have been a little tighter but it worked good! Really didn’t think something this cute would fit on my body but it does!!! I am a size 12 in jeans and a DD in the bra and I ordered an Large!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: High wasted bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite bathing suit...however...not because of the quality. The quality isn’t the best. It’s not super thick and you can clearly see the defined round padding pieces in the top. I love this suit though because it rest right above the belly button and covers any little extra pudge you may want to hide. It also definitely rides but the butt, which is kind of ok because that is “in” right now but I do wish it didn’t do that. I am 5’9”, 135lbs, and I ordered a medium. I’m a 36A bra and about a size 6/8 pants. It pretty much fits just like it shows in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Swimwear great price fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I’ve already purchased for swimsuits this year that I was not very satisfied with I was hesitant to purchase a swimsuit off of Amazon because I can’t try it on and I hate doing returns however I went ahead and purchased this it was a great price very flattering I’ve had four children I am more of a petite build but I have stretch marks on my stomach so it does come up a little bit over my belly button area obviously the darker color is more slimming and flattering the top and bottom fit great it makes my rear end look great I actually might buy this and a few other colors shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Order true size! Top is a bit big though
customer_reviews.text: I was between sizes and ordered the large based on reviews. I’m normally a medium. This seems like great quality material but it was way too big. I’m 5’7”, bust 37-38”, waist 29”, hips 40” and the large was huge and wrinkled with extra fabric (top and bottoms). I’m going try to return for a medium. Update: I got the medium and the bottoms fit perfect! The top is a tad big, but not unwearable. I normally wear size medium for swim suits. Pant size 6-8, these fit true to size. No need to size up for these
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Love it but giving it 4 stars since the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it but giving it 4 stars since the top is pretty big. it would be nice to be able to order the pieces separately. i have a bigger bottom and smaller top. but it still fit enough to wear out. i even wear the top with outfits. i'm 5'3" and 240lbs. i was pleasantly surprised that i could even get the bottoms on. could use a tad more room in them but that just means it's time to lose some weight. lol. would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t size up
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so listening to the reviews I read, I went with a size Large. I sized up, upon recommendation. Biggest mistake I made, I should of listened to the few that said nope nope it’s true to size. I’m 5’3 168lbs, my waist is 28/29 and my bust 36C. I should of gotten a medium, the large is a little loose around the waist and the bust is a little saggy. I’ll keep it because I can wear it in my hot tub it to tan, it’s too much of a hassle to return. My suggestion is to not size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Swim suit
customer_reviews.text: I loved this suit! The only thing I didn’t like was the padding inside of the top! It moves around a lot and has wrinkles in it that make your boobs look strange. I had to remove the padding and with my hair straightener I removed the wrinkles from the padding and then inserted them back inside the top and it looked so much better! No wrinkles and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for that seamless, bandage fit like the picture shows, this ain't it. The top has a thin strip of elastic on the top and bottom that barely stretches, so good luck pulling that over your head. Bottoms were just as disappointing and to top it all off, the "pink" was more of a nude color. Imagine the color of a sunburnt old white man. Companies really shouldn't be allowed to falsely advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought plenty of swimming suits here on amazon, but this one is by far my favorite! I’d definitely suggest ordering one size up because it will fit perfectly that way. Very very flattering on the body! Even if you aren’t curvy, it’ll make you look curvy and if you are already curvy it’ll make your curves look amazing. The butt coverage isn’t too much or too little. It’s just perfect for little peek at the cheeks. It makes you look sexy, but still covered where you don’t need to feel self conscious. Great quality for the price. I even have this in black, blue, and red. I’d definitely buy all the colors!
customer_reviews.author: gaotdlor

customer_reviews.title: Buy two of the same size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one orange one black same size large. The black bottoms fit perfect and the top was a little large. The orange bottoms fit a little snug and the top fit perfect.The bottoms are definitely CHEEKY, but it sits well and I have a tummy and it conceals it. I wear a size 10 am 5’6 , 38D and 185 lbs So with that said I ended up with one suit I can wear. For the price and fast shipping you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella G.

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED with this bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bathing suit after reading all of the promising reviews and I LOVE it. it fits perfectly and is great quality for the price! Ive worn it so many times already since buying a few weeks ago. Only downside is that the L bottom fits perfectly but the L top is slightly too big on me, but it still works! I just fold the top to make it a bit smaller. Note that the bottom is "cheeky" so it will not cover your entire booty! It's also the perfect amount of high-waisted... covers the belly button and ends right above it. So flattering!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cord

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3 118 and purchased the small in the ribbed neon orange color. It’s comfortable. Fits well and looks cute with a sarong coverup. I have a short torso so it goes up about 2 inches past my bellybutton. I’m a 34B and the small top fits comfortable with and without the straps. It’s stretchy so it can accommodate a larger chest as well. The bottom fits very very very cheeky on me. It’s pretty much a thong. If you have a smaller butt it might not ride up as much.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: hate the top
customer_reviews.text: as pictured but i really dont like the top. it has no elasticity to stay up if you have a chest like i do (36DD) , so you have no option but to wear the removable straps.. the straps hook in really obviously and the metal hook shows instead of being hidden. If you try wearing it as a bandeau like pictured, the little loops where the optional straps attach show like little tabs..so either way the top looks really cheap/poorly made in my opinion because the little details show..but its fine for wearing in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: its a great suit
customer_reviews.text: I got an xL bc usually with these suits I need to size up but this one I could have gotten away with the large, even a medium. The bottoms fit perfect with room to spair but the top I am gonna have to take in bc its huge but that is my mistake(I have ds and it still is big). Amazon told me to get a medium and I sized up two sizes. Lol the material is great. I like the high rise in the bottoms and the fact that it shows a little cheek and doesn't push my butt in and make it look smaller like some suits do that are high rise.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice material
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 2 piece that showed a little more cheek. These are so cute! I like the material (thick),and the cut. I wish the lining wasn't white though because sometimes you can see it fold up on the bottoms. I also wish the bottoms were like an inch higher to the belly button. It goes to about an inch below my belly button unless I pull them up. And then my booty cheeks are really hanging out. Lol. I've gotten lots of compliments when I wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Lige

customer_reviews.title: Sexy but secure
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit is great. The bottoms will show your entire ass if you got that junk like me, so you may want to find an alternate. They’re very sexy and perfect for the gram. For a little more cover, I paired with my own high waist bottoms and it was perfect. *chefs kiss* For $22, it’s a great price even just for the top The top doesn’t slip and side, very nice and wide. I typically wear a 16 and the XL was snug but secure and flattering.
customer_reviews.author: olivesvl

customer_reviews.title: Great bottoms top is ok.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 12/14 and 5’5. I ordered an XL and they fit as expected but I wanted a bit more room but that was the biggest size. I ordered the blue and it was good material. The top was almost a bit too long and not as flattering as I’d hope. However, the bottoms are great and I rarely feel comfortable in a swim suit. The bottoms go up high enough that it covers a bit over my belly button and smoothes area out. The back isn’t thong but cheeky for sure. Overall worth the price just for the bottoms as I couldn’t find similar anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Seams coming apart on day 1
customer_reviews.text: I loved this suit when it came. It was cute, flattering and fit true to size. I’m a size 6 and got a medium. I was so excited to wear it to the pool. It was pointed out on the first day of wearing it, that the seams on both sides were already coming undone. So it either came this way, or happened after just one use. Both of those scenarios are super disappointing. Really bummed as I was ready to tell everyone about this great suit. Save yourself the $ and order somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: Stitching doesn’t stretch on top
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I’m 5’1 and about a size 16z Color as pictured, but ran a little small. Liked that I could easily remove the cups, but the bottoms aren’t very high-waisted on me. They come up to my belly button, but don’t cover it unless I deliberately pull them up higher. The top has very little stretch to it. The stitching makes it a little smaller than it would be if it didn’t have this stitching. But it’s well made and nice overall.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but wish you could order top/bottom in different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I have a weird shaped body where I am a M-L up top and a XL on bottom. I ordered an XL. The bottoms on these are a bit small and the top is a bit big, but since I’m just laying around in the yard trying to get rid of sports bra tan lines, this bikini does the job. Definitely wouldn’t go on any water rides with this on. People would get more of a show than they bargained for. Wish you could order the bottom/top in different sizes for people that have more junk in the trunk and itty bitties up top.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny top - large chested girls heads up
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this swimsuit. For reference, I’m 5’9”, 180lbs, and a 38DD. I got a large. I wish they let you buy the top and bottom in different sizes. The bottoms fit well, but the top was so tiny I could barely get my shoulders through. There is no back clasp or stretch to the top, either of which would have been nice. I thought about sizing up to a xl but honestly I still don’t think the top would fit and then the bottoms would be too big. I got the green one and the color was nice. I just really wish the sizing was better.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could pick separate sizing for top and bottom!
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms fit perfect! Soft and not too tight (no muffin-ing!). The Top is much larger than I expected. I ordered "L" based on the size chart and my largest measurement (Hips = 41") and the top works with the straps, but I would not wear it swimming (I'm a 34 D, usually large sizes give me the best coverage but this is just too baggy). Good for lounging or as underwear for club/festival/Vegas fun outfits. I might order another set in Medium to mix and match based on purpose.
customer_reviews.author: PDXLady

customer_reviews.title: I wish I ordered all of them!
customer_reviews.text: Great high waisted swimsuit, fast shipping, and the colors come as they appear. I'm tall (5'9), have a larger bust (38D), and wear a size 12 in pants, so the large sky blue suit fit perfectly. I LOVE the coverage this swimsuit offers as opposed to regular bikinis. It's shows just the right amount of skin and keeps all your 'cash and prizes' in place while you walk, play, or tan on the beach. VERY happy with my purchase and hope this review helps other ladies interested in the swimsuit :)
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bathing suit just like this from a different seller last year, it worked but was honestly a little too tight on the bottoms. When I went to buy another for this summer I saw the old seller was gone, and I discovered this one instead. After reading all of the reviews it looked like the fit was better for curvy girls. The top is way wider than the other and the bottoms go up higher by at least an inch and a half. Very comfortable and flattering. 5”7 190
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cannot beat these suits. I’m 5 foot 3 and got an XL because I’m large in the butt. Fit is a little inconsistent as I just ordered my 4th of this same suit and they all fit just a bit different. I would have loved to get a smaller top and larger bottom but again for the pool at home these are perfect. The high waist hides the belly which I wanted and being able to add or take off the straps on the top is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lizc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute for price
customer_reviews.text: UPDT to my review. The sides of the top are ripping. I’ve only worn it once... TO TRY ON. It has not even left my house. I like this, does what it looks like on the model on me? Not exactly. This would be perfect for a woman with a very curvy body I am not so curvy. I really like the coverage on it the bottoms too, It shows a little but is still very covering. The top is fine, it's almost like a bandeau top with built in cups.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Lundeberg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Breathable material and fits perfect. Not too tight or digging into me causing fat rolls and not too loose where it still holds up my DD’s with the straps. Not much support without the straps. Very cheeky making it sexy and love the high cut. I usually wear medium to large for a looser feel and ordered a medium and its exactly that. Large would have been huge and a small would have been tighter but prob would have caused fat rolls. If you wear medium and want a tighter look go for small. Also if your cup size is smaller than 36D go for small.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: This was not a good look on me
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good look on me. I am usually a size 10, i’m 170 lbs, 5’6. Im a 34G bra size (aka impossible to find a bikini top). I would say that if you feel you have a bigger butt/hips and a smaller bust or vice versa, i wouldnt go for this. Doesnt fit. The top was flimsy with no support and very thin, sheer fabric. You can see the tags thru the fabric. Bottoms were actually okay, but not great. Overall i’m just not a fan of the material. Bikinis at the same price range from zaful.com have much better material and more support.
customer_reviews.author: SS/IJW

customer_reviews.title: My favorite swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Ok i am always worried about buying swimsuits from China on here but this is my absolute favorite swimsuit. I ordered the olive green one, it looks just like the photo. The top is just a little too big. I ordered a size large, i am 5’6”, 170lbs, and a 36DD I was also worried about the bottoms being more like a thong, but they are just cheeky, so not too scandalous at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hayle

customer_reviews.title: It was okay...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a L and XL to see how they felt cause I was worried about the top being big. I have a really big bottom but only about C cup up top. I ended up liking the large better but the top didn't seem as big as everyone claimed. It just seemed more like a crop top rather than a suit and I liked that. I didn't end up keeping because it was too cheeky for me but that's just preference.
customer_reviews.author: lebbiee

customer_reviews.title: Flattering, Versatile, and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought the plain black two piece. Being that I’m 5’4 with some unflattering areas after my 3 babies, this bathing suit fit remarkably well. It accented what it needed to and hid other parts. I went on a trip and we danced a lot but my suit never budged. Now considering my thick thighs and heavy bottom I expected wedgies and readjustments throughout the day...never! So impressed with that! Straps easily came off so I was able to mix and match with other suits. Now I want to by the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: An actual buyer

customer_reviews.title: Seams ripped after one use
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this suit, and I love the idea of a thick bandeau top I'm a B/C cup, so I usually don't have a problem with holding my girls up. When I got the product it smelled funky, but ok that's forgivable. The first time I wore this, I only wore the top under a sheer shirt because I enjoyed the effect. Only ever washed the suit on delicates, and when a few days later I decided to try it out on the beach it was a no go. I fixed the seams myself, but I never trusted the suit again without some additional hold.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hostrawser

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this. I would give it zero stars if it allowed. The swimsuit looks nothing like the picture. It is displayed as a seamless, banded, high waist bottom. It is none of the above. More mid rise, does not cover belly button, and the thick band as displayed is not present. Fits like granny-style, full coverage bottom. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: Super cute !
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review for Amazon and this is my first time ever doing so because I have to express how this bathing suit is super cute. I have been thoroughly reading reviews on this bathing suit and debated whether to get a medium or a small. I am 4’11 126 pounds and 34dd And decided to take a chance and get a small. The bottom fit great although a little cheeky but perfect. The top did fit me, maybe the medium would’ve fit slightly better but it is still cute nevertheless. I will definitely be going to the beach soon. Don’t think twice and get it!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Too was too big, bottom was too small
customer_reviews.text: The color was cute and the style looks cute in the photos, but I think it makes it look like it is more flattering for bottom-heavy people than it truly is. The bottoms fit my waist but dug in at the leg opening pretty bad. The top was a size too big for me. I was surprised because I have a pretty exact hourglass shape. Cute color, nice fabric, not flattering on my body’s shape.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT! I had been looking for a strapless two piece for months that would be flattering on my post baby body and help me cover the obnoxious tan lines from my one piece “mom suit” and this checked all the boxes! I am OBSESSED with this swimsuit! Already recommended to several of my coworkers who also bought it. This swimsuit really looks good on every single body type! For reference I am 165lbs, 5’2, 36DDD and I purchased a large!
customer_reviews.author: Angel A.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color, straps are too close together and waist band cuts in.
customer_reviews.text: The color is amazing! The cut doesn’t work well with my body. I’m 5’4” with a long torso, about 124lbs (usually a bit less), 34B. I wanted something that goes above my belly button and this doesn’t. Also the band at the top sorta cuts into my waist, so I found other styles that didn’t have the band. The detachable straps are too close together so it looks like suspenders so I would wear them without.
customer_reviews.author: VeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect suit for hiding muffin top
customer_reviews.text: I hate bathing suits. Like hate myself in them and this bathing suit actually made me feel pretty good about myself 😂 Ir fits snug in the right places and the bottoms help to hide the muffin top. I got an xl. I'm a size 14. It's a little loose but after washing and drying it for perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for petite girls!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’m 5’3,115 lbs, and an xs/s in tops and 26 in bottoms. I have small boobs but a bigger butt and the small fits me perfectly! The cheekiness is just right. I prefer the bathing suit with no straps and have found if I actually wear the bandeau upside down it fits me in the chest a lot better because rightsideup was a little too loose. But overall am in love and have been searching for the perfect cheeky high rise 2 piece! Will look into ordering other styles and colors!
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY. TRASH.
customer_reviews.text: The worst bathing suit ever. Don’t waste your time or money. Unfortunately got this during the pandemic & didn’t have time to return it. So I threw it in the trash, didn’t even wanna give it to someone to burden them. If there were a no star option , I’d do that! Bathing suit is completely see through , the padding in the top is so weird & just makes you look like a potato
customer_reviews.author: Laura Medwid

product_meta.title: Pink Queen Women's Removable Strap Wrap Pad Cheeky High Waist Bikini Set Swimsuit
feature_bullets: Bandeau Bikini top with removable padding bra,shoulder strap
High waisted cheeky bikini bottom style
Perfect for SPA,swiming,pool,beach party,vacations,yog or other occasion
Hand wash in cold and machine wash both avaialable
Size S/M/L/XL for choose,detail on description
